abstract: The card used to complete a payment.
overview:
## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentMethod]. For privacy reasons, only the `type` property ([doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentMethodType]) is provided in most cases before the user authorizes the transaction.

This attribute is contained by the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/onpaymentmethodselected] event. Access this attribute using the event parameter in the callback function; for example, `var myPaymentMethod = event.paymentMethod;`.

# paymentMethod

**Instance Property**

The card used to complete a payment.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute ApplePayPaymentMethod paymentMethod;
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentMethod]. For privacy reasons, only the `type` property ([doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentMethodType]) is provided in most cases before the user authorizes the transaction.

This attribute is contained by the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/onpaymentmethodselected] event. Access this attribute using the event parameter in the callback function; for example, `var myPaymentMethod = event.paymentMethod;`.
title: paymentMethod
